name: HD Skin Matte Velvet Blurring Foundation & Setting Powder
about: What it is: A multi-purpose, lightweight powder with buildable coverage that blurs the look of imperfections and mattifies skin for up to 24 hours, with no caking or creasing...Coverage: Full.Finish: Matte.Formulation: Pressed Powder.Highlighted Ingredients: - Trio-Blur Complex: Visibly reduces the appearance of texture immediately and for up to 24 hours...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: This waterproof and sweatproof formula has customizable coverage suitable to set makeup, touch-up on-the-go, or wear alone as foundation. Equipped with a dual-sided sponge and mirror for convenient application. The silky formula provides all-day wear while locking in hydration for maximum comfort...Clinical Results: Based on self-assessment by 30 people:.- 97% agreed that the foundation is immediately comfortable and lets skin breathe.- 94% agreed that the finish is natural, not cakey.- 94% agreed that the foundation reduces shine
ingredients: -Trio-Blur Complex: Visibly reduces the appearance of texture immediately and for up to 24 hours...Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Boron Nitride, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Silica, Polymethyl Methacrylate, Alumina, Zinc Laurate, Methicone, Dimethicone, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Aluminum Hydroxide, Hydrogen Dimethicone, Tocopherol, [+/- Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 77163 (Bismuth Oxychloride)]...Product ingredient listings are updated periodically. Before using a MAKE UP FOR EVER product, please read the ingredient list on the packaging to ensure that the ingredients are suitable for your personal use.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Prep your complexion with your favorite skincare or preferred primer. .-Apply starting from the center of the face outwards. .-For sheer coverage or to set makeup, apply with a powder brush..-For medium coverage or touch-ups throughout the day, apply with the white side of the included sponge. .-For full coverage, apply and build with the beige side of the included sponge.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 1Y08 Warm Porcelain - fair to light skin tones with yellow undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Don't like this product at all. It eccentuated fine lines & wrinkles. Has a weird yellow tinge to it as well that doesn't compliment skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I used to love the old formula but this new one is awful. The color is so yellow and this formula makes me breakout so bad! I have tiny little whiteheads everywhere I applied this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is every oily girls dream. You can customize your coverage for the no makeup looks, or pack it on till your look is achieved. It took me 3x to get my color match as they do run warm or slightly yellow. Just a heads up!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great for older skin.  Smooth and great coverage - hides fine lines - does not get caught up in them

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 2Y30 Warm Sand - medium skin tones with yellow undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Was not the right color I looked white and old and dry and idk if it was the product but I got a rash also so had to return it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this as a finishing powder and lightly set my whole base and it locked me in for the whole night! After a 12hr shift at the hospital it stayed put!
this product keeps my skin feeling hydrated and looking amazing.  highly reccomend
Great foundation. Looks good. Easy to use.i have  been using for years

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Powder and I have always been on opposite sides of the beauty spectrum. She was like that classmate you never spoke to, despite sharing every class since the 4th grade. But this powder? Itu2019s a game-changer! I canu2019t get over how effortlessly it gives you an airbrushed finish without any dryness or cakiness. It melts into your skin like magic on contact. The only tip Iu2019d give is to try the shades in-store, as some of my usual favorites didnu2019t quite hit the mark. Overall, this powder is definitely on its way to becoming a Holy Grail in my beauty collection!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's a solid powder foundation, it is buildable but not completely full coverage. I do have to set it with a setting spray otherwise you can see the powder sitting on the skin, but it does what it needs to do.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Holy grail product. I was color matched perfectly in store. Good coverage thatu2019s not too heavy or light. I have super sensitive skin and this has continued to work for me.

reviews.review_title: Easy to apply and great coverage
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This sits so well on my skin and is my perfect colour.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 2N26 Sand - medium skin tones with neutral undertones

reviews.review_text: Mine get broken and I got color sand and didnu2019t match
Something about the formula makes it terribly reflective in photos. it is cakey and the color looks off. do not buy if you plan on taking pictures with flash because this would ruin them

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Goes on sooo smooth and stays the day! Ensure you're using a hydrating moisturizer to prevent any flaking

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 1Y08 Warm Porcelain - fair to light skin tones with yellow undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fit my skin tone as Asian. I used a brush to tap on my face, after applying primer. Love this matte look.

reviews.review_title: Got rid of their original colors
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Bring back the old shade names. Itu2019s confusing that they changed all the colors and messed up the formula. I will be switching to another brand. The OG colors were less orangey

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As a person who typically uses liquid foundation this powder was very nice. The application looks smooth and I love the matte look. It was very easy to apply with a kabuki brush. I sometimes also used it as a setting powder. The foundation would last me most of the work day and it never looked cakey.
